app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/article/10.3390/foods10051103/s1, Table S1: Effect of ethanol, ascorbic acid (AsA), peppermint oil (PMO), and tea tree oil (TTO) on appearance, weight loss, firmness, total chlorophyll, and vitamin C of fresh-cut green bean pods storied at 5 °C for 15 d, Table S2: Effect of ethanol, ascorbic acid (AsA), peppermint oil (PMO), and tea tree oil (TTO) on total soluble solids (TSS), and total phenolic compound (TPC), mold and yeast (CFU/g), and total count (CFU/g) of fresh-cut green bean pods storied at 5 °C for 15 d.
